title: Looking for T206 HOFer's with tough backs
author: PEEK enterprises

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 HOFer's with tough backs
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to purchase, or trade for (trade list below), T206 Hall of Famers with Carolina Brights and Broad Leaf (350) backs.  I would also be interested in strong common players with these backs.  Please email anything you may have with prices or trade proposals.  High resolution scans of the cards below available upon request.

Thanks - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]

Addie Joss E93 - PSA 5
Chief Bender E90-1 - PSA 4
Christy Mathewson 1908 E102 - PSA 4
Christy Mathewson T206 Black Cap - PSA 4
Cy Young E101 - PSA 2
Cy Young T206 Glove Shows (Polar Bear) - SGC 40

Honus Wagner E95 - PSA 3
